metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18310 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in dwfl_segment_report_module.c in libdwfl in elfutils through v0.174. The vulnerability allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) with a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated by consider_notes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1').
